backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing site ownership, access control, user profiles, orders, and contact messages with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions with OKLCH variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router setup defining public and admin routes wrapped in global error boundaries.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard managing Internet Identity login, ownership checks, and controlled access to admin pages.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Bitcoin: Displays BTC payment details for an order with copy‑to‑clipboard actions for order ID, address, and amount.
frontend/src/components/error/GlobalErro: Implements a React error boundary that logs detailed error info and renders a custom fallback on failure.
frontend/src/components/error/SafeSectio: Wraps UI sections in an error boundary to prevent localized failures from crashing the app.
frontend/src/components/layout/PromoTick: Renders a scrolling promo banner combined with live BTC rate information.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Main site layout with header, navigation, promo ticker, recent orders, and footer rendering.
frontend/src/components/orders/RecentOrd: Shows a dropdown of recent user orders with status badges and quick navigation links.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Denom: Displays purchasable USDT denominations with live BTC pricing, discounts, and selection highlighting.
Shows a callout card highlighting the minimum and maximum available USDT denominations.
Dropdown selector for choosing a USDT denomination with range display.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Quant: Quantity input with increment/decrement buttons enforcing min/max bounds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBtcUsdtRate.ts: Fetches and caches BTC/USDT rates with fallbacks and periodic refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login handling, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderHistory.ts: Loads and tracks persisted order history with storage event syncing and error safety.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderHistoryDetail: Fetches details for multiple orders using parallel queries tied to the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for interacting with backend orders and contact messages.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables including Binance-inspired colors and ticker animation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays information about the service, its offerings, and how the Binance gift card marketplace works.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminContactMes: Admin page listing all customer contact messages with table view, loading states, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin page that loads a single order, shows detailed info, and lets admins update its status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin listing page that fetches and displays all orders with status badges and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Provides denomination selection, quantity choice, product details, and navigates users to checkout with saved cart data.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles order form submission, applies discounts, creates backend orders, and shows Bitcoin payment details.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form that sends messages through a backend mutation and shows success or error states.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Shows frequently asked questions about Binance gift cards using an accordion layout.
frontend/src/pages/GlobalErrorFallbackPa: Displays a fallback UI for unexpected errors with options to reload or return home and shows detailed error info in development mode.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, feature highlights, and navigation to the product catalog.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Shows a user's past orders with status badges, loading states, and links to detailed order views.
frontend/src/pages/OrderStatusPage.tsx: Displays detailed status and payment information for a specific order, including BTC/USDT rate info and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/TrackOrderPage.tsx: Provides a form for users to enter an order ID and navigate to its status page, with basic validation and guidance.
frontend/src/state/cartSession.ts: SessionStorage-backed helpers for saving, loading, and clearing the cart state.
frontend/src/state/orderHistory.ts: LocalStorage-backed order history with in-memory fallback, providing load, add, update, and remove operations.
frontend/src/utils/btcRate.ts: Utility functions for formatting BTC rates and generating status labels and warnings based on data source.
frontend/src/utils/denominations.ts: Exports a fixed list of supported gift card denominations.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Helpers for normalizing, formatting, and categorizing errors, including backend and network-specific cases.
frontend/src/utils/orderStatus.ts: Maps backend order statuses to simplified labels and badge variants for UI display.
frontend/src/utils/pricing.ts: Provides pricing utilities including discount application, BTC/USDT conversions, and amount formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL params, storing them in sessionStorage, retrieving persisted values, and cleaning parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending fonts, colors, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, issues, features, and pending requests related to integrating a live BTC price feed.
